featured.text: It must be free from impurity, while exhibiting some fruitiness and creating a pleasant bitter flavor along with a peppery sensation in the mouth.
While earworms might be annoying, most people who experience them nevertheless report that they are pleasant or at least neutral.
Simply removing the jingle of telephones and replacing them with the pleasant sounds of birds has had a remarkable effect on everyone.
An ______ person is usually pleasant and easy to get along with, but don’t expect that he or she will always say “yes” to everything.
The round windows are indeed pleasant to the eye, but they actually were designed for reasons 16 aesthetics.

definition.en_def: Giving a sense of happy satisfaction or enjoyment.
definition.example: The weather was pleasant, perfect for a picnic.
